dmca.title: Follow-up re: Pirelliweb.com
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Pirelli

Pursuant to our conversation today, enclosed please find the requested copies of numerous trademarks, service marks, and trade names owned by Pirelli S.p.A. ("Pirelli"). Based on these and other marks, we hereby reiterate the demands specified in our January 8, 2002 email that you cease and desist from using the domain name "Pirelliweb.com" and the trade name "Pirelli Web Publishing" because these uses infringe upon and dilute Pirelli's rights in its marks.

By sending you this letter, Pirelli is not waiving any of its legal or equitable rights or remedies, all of which are expressely reserved.

Best regards,
[signature]
[Private]
Law Clerk Currently Pending
Admission to NY State Bar

Enclosures

cc: [Private]
